name: Death and Humor
description:
Dungeon crawler for Ludum Dare 43

Arrow keys to move.  Click to interact with the map.

Credits:

Mike - Map programming, Warrior voice

Eric - Sound recording and editing, Priest and Rogue voice.

Amber - Text and loremaster, Druid voice.

Austin - Map and audio programming, some enemy voices.

Scott - Combat programming, Scholar voice.

Rhaegar (cat) - bear voice.

Daenerys (cat) - catfish voice.
